item.description:
1. Nintendo Debuts Two Metroid Prime 4 Ads As Eight-Year Wait Nears Its End  Nintendo Life
  2. Metroid Mondays: Watch the overview trailer for Metroid Prime 4: Beyond  Nintendo
  3. Metroid Prime 4: Beyond’s chatty NPCs aren’t as surprising as you think  Polygon
  4. Metroid Prime 4: Beyond delivers the series' trademark gameplay in spades, but I fear one very annoying addition might derail the whole thing  Eurogamer
  5. Metroid Prime 4: Beyond file sizes revealed  GoNintendo
